description: Verify the scalability-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run scalability-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide a scalability-scoring scorecard with 6 issues across Bundle Size, RSC Architecture, Concurrency.
expectations: Run scalability-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 6 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run scalability-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (entire page is "use client"), HIGH (sequential DB queries in layout), MEDIUM (no event listener cleanup).
tests.pass_criteria: RSC extraction fixed first (CRITICAL), then parallel queries (HIGH, RSC 15% weight), then event cleanup (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run scalability-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/bundle-images.md` and applies the "Dynamic Import Heavy Libraries" pattern. Fix converts top-level imports to `next/dynamic` with `{ ssr: false }`.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run scalability-fix to apply the Suspense Boundaries fix and verify build and rendering
expectations: Run scalability-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: `pnpm build` succeeds, page renders with streaming, no layout shift
tests.pass_criteria: Skill confirms Suspense wrapper added with appropriate fallback. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run scalability-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 56/100 (grade C). Apply fixes for 1 CRITICAL + 3 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B+. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
